DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effect of a mailed educational brochure on adherence to referral for screening colonoscopy. The comparison (or control) group receives no mailer, which is usual care.
DOC.brief_title: RCT of Mailed Brochure to Boost Adherence to Screening Colonoscopy
DOC.criteria: Referrals for screening colonoscopy; Asymptomatic; age>=50 Referrals for diagnostic colonoscopy
